name: SuluBrowser
short_description: SuluBrowser is a web browser that is meant to be a simple but effective way to browse the web. The browser contains 3 engines from the biggest web browsers available now (Chrome, Internet Explorer, Firefox) and utilities that makes browsing the web a breeze. Use the personalized MiTab to have a unique browsing experience catered to YOU. SuluBrowser will be released on September 26, 2014 to Microsoft Windows computers and to Mac OS X on a unannounced date. Stay Tuned for more announcements.
summary: Simple, Intuitive Web Browser for Windows PC
